Bash("G:\\내 드라이브\\developer\\hanmed-cdss\\scripts\\fix-purple.ps1" << 'SCRIPT'
$file = "G:\\내 드라이브\\developer\\hanmed-cdss\\apps\\web\\src\\components\\layouts\\DashboardLayout.tsx"
$content = Get-Content $file -Raw -Encoding UTF8

$content = $content -replace 'from-purple-500 to-pink-500', 'from-slate-600 to-slate-700'
$content = $content -replace "hover:bg-purple-50", 'hover:bg-slate-50'
$content = $content -replace "text-purple-400", 'text-slate-400'
$content = $content -replace 'bg-purple-100 text-purple-700', 'bg-slate-100 text-slate-700'
$content = $content -replace "'purple'", "'slate'"

$content | Set-Content $file -Encoding UTF8 -NoNewline
Write-Output "Done replacing in DashboardLayout.tsx"
SCRIPT)
